scripts.build:app: rm -r -f dist && mkdir dist && cp -r ./src/ ./dist && browserify -e ./src/app.js -o ./dist/app.js
scripts.start: rm -r -f dist && mkdir dist && cp -r ./src/ ./dist && browserify -e ./src/app.js -o ./dist/app.js && cd dist && npx http-server -c-1
scripts.config-and-start: node generateConfig.mjs && rm -r -f dist && mkdir dist && cp -r ./src/ ./dist && browserify -e ./src/app.js -o ./dist/app.js && cd dist && npx http-server ./src -c-1
